scripts.dev: concurrently --raw "npm run dev -w shell-mfe" "npm run dev -w home-mfe" "npm run dev -w auth-mfe"
scripts.build: concurrently --raw "npm run build -w shell-mfe" "npm run build -w home-mfe" "npm run build -w auth-mfe"
scripts.serve: concurrently --raw "npm run serve -w shell-mfe" "npm run serve -w home-mfe" "npm run serve -w auth-mfe"
